name: nuxi
description: Nuxt CLI (nuxi) for creating and managing Nuxt projects

readme.summary: The README assumes the reader already knows what Nuxt is and provides minimal practical guidance, relegating critical information to external documentation.
readme.top_issue: No installation instructions for end users - only contributor setup instructions are provided

injection_risks.description: Arbitrary command execution vulnerability using `tinyexec` with user-controlled input
Arbitrary command execution vulnerability using `tinyexec` with user-controlled input

critical_findings: Arbitrary command execution vulnerability using `tinyexec` with user-controlled input
security.summary: The codebase has a high-risk arbitrary command execution vulnerability and lacks sufficient input validation, but does not expose sensitive secrets or error details.

common_complaints: Dependency management and package manager compatibility (Yarn, Bun, npm)
Development server stability issues (crashes, HMR port conflicts, WebSocket errors)
Initialization script failures with template arguments
Breaking changes in CLI API between minor versions requiring migration
sentiment.summary: nuxi/Nuxt CLI shows moderate community engagement with several unresolved stability issues around package managers and dev server reliability, but recent issue closures and active discussions suggest maintainers are addressing problems incrementally.

communication.summary: The maintainer responses are generally clear and helpful, showing a good level of technical depth and patience with users.

concerns: No commits in past 6 months despite last commit being recent (2026-01-12)
98 open issues with no recent activity or resolution
No closed issues in past 6 months indicating lack of active maintenance
No merged PRs in past 6 months showing no development progress
Zero active contributors in past 6 months
Unknown last release date suggests release process is inactive
positive_signals: Recent commit activity exists (2026-01-12), though isolated
maintenance.summary: Package shows signs of abandonment with zero maintenance activity over 6 months despite 98 open issues awaiting resolution.

analysis_summary.doc_summary: The documentation is lacking in key areas, making it difficult for new users to get started with the package.
concerns: Docs: No clear installation instructions are provided for the nuxi package itself.
Community: Yarn install of nuxt project does not work.
Security: Arbitrary command execution vulnerability using `tinyexec` with user-controlled input
Security: Arbitrary command execution vulnerability using `tinyexec` with user-controlled input
Security: Arbitrary command execution vulnerability using `tinyexec` with user-controlled input
highlights: High number of commits in the past six months (225)
A significant number of merged PRs in the past six months (158)
Recent last commit and release dates
